text:
The documentation has some false informations about which Font Awesome icons can be used. The long-arrow-* icons are not in the free plan. You have to use long-arrow-alt-* icons. <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-general/how-to-install-font-awesome#use-a-font-awesome-kit>

This are the icons you can use: <https://fontawesome.com/v5.0.13/icons?d=gallery&m=free>
